alert.note: Alert for Oneida; Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 22 at 2:53PM CST until February 23 at 12:00AM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...WINTRY PRECIPITATION CONTINUING ACROSS THE AREA LATE THIS AFTERNOON... .A low pressure system centered over southwest Lower Michigan late Tuesday afternoon will track to Lake Huron by midnight. Periods of snow generated by the system will continue during the late afternoon, and any lingering sleet over east-central Wisconsin will change to snow. The most persistent heavy snow will occur across north-central Wisconsin. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations between 3 and 6 inches. * WHERE...Oneida and Vilas Counties. * WHEN...Until Midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on hazardous travel conditions. Snow falling at the rate of over one inch per hour could significantly reduce the visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, use extra caution. Take a flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
